terms.termDef: std::chrono::steady_clock - Класс {стабильных часов}
Модель памяти -
Object - Combination of location in memory, type and {lifetime}
Lifetime -
packaged_task - {многопоточные инструменты} {future} + {promise} + callable + exception-safe
std -
Variable -
File - named area on a {data storage} used to store some amount of data
Bit - most basic {data type}. It can only be in 2 different states. For convenience, they are denoted as 1 and 0 or true and false
Byte - {data type} consisting of several {bits}, usually 8 {bits}
Information - abstract knowledge about something, regardless of the form of presentation
Data - {information} presented in a formalized/structured form suitable for transmission or processing
Data type - a set of {data} conventions that defines the set of valid values for data and the operations allowed on it
Data storage - potentially any material object that can store some amount of {data} unchanged for some amount of time
Program -
Operating system -
File system - system, that organizes {files} to make efficient use of space and maintains the validity of {file names} on {data storage}
File name - unique {string} identifier of {file} on specific {data storage}
Source code - {file}, containing {code} on some {programming language}
String -
char -
Character - {data type} that contains some symbol or grapheme in natural language
Data structure - method of data
